remarks:
An abstraction relation is a subset of a related Cartesian product. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-1995.) 

---

 An abstraction relation is a subset of a related cross product. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jul-1995.)
statement:
opabssxp $p |- { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ph ) } C_ ( A X. B ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
